report.title: Alpha and Omega
report.author: J. Freeman
report.bodytext: I accepted Him into my world; He showed me the path He made. /n He and I chose to kill me, but not before an hour of play. /n My mind wouldn't surrender, so it was slayed. My soul washed away. /n And then, as I learned how everything really is, I realize I am God. /n 'I am the alpha *and* the omega!' I remembered I did once say. /n And there We were, staring at each other in dismay, /n thinking, 'So this is how it all ends? /n I *never* would have guessed (what We had made)!'
